'''Hulu''' is an [[NPC]] in [[Liyue]]. He can be found near the [[Statue of The Seven]] at [[Dihua Marsh]], [[Bishui Plain]].

==Profile==
<!--detailed story/lore information goes here-->
By his own admission, Hulu sells wine from the [[Dawn Winery]] with altered labels naming them as Liyue's.

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Hulu:''' Welcome! Care for a bottle of two of Liyue's finest local brew?
:{{DIcon}} What's it like?
::'''Hulu:''' It looks like liquid amber, and has just a hint of sweetness when it first hits the tongue...
::'''Hulu:''' ...Followed shortly by a wonderful mellow aftertaste that lingers long after the fact. You won't find one better!
::'''Hulu:''' And because we buy direct from Dawn Winery, we pass the savings right on to you...
::{{DIcon}} Dawn Winery?
:::'''Hulu:''' What about it? ...Oops, did I...
:::'''Hulu:''' I&mdash;I don't think I... I definitely said this is a local Liyue wine...
:::{{DIcon}} You said it alright, clear as day.
:::'''Hulu:''' ...I can tell from the look in your eyes that I am faced with an expert...
:::'''Hulu:''' Okay, I'll admit it. We buy from the Dawn Winery and change the labels.
:::'''Hulu:''' It's not like I want to lie, but the Dawn Winery's wines are second to none.
::{{DIcon}} Not interested, thanks.
:::'''Hulu:''' N&mdash;Not interested? Come on, it's not every day you travel to Liyue, surely? Don't go home empty-handed...
:{{DIcon}} No thanks, bye.
::'''Hulu:''' You're sure I can't persuade you?
{{Dialogue end}}
